57123.「むむっ？ ブロッゲンさまの出番が\n 来たようでアール！: Hmm? It looks like it's Master Broggen's turn!

57125.「おお <pc>よ。\n 元気そうで なによりだ……と\n ブロッゲンさまは 言:
Oh, <pc>. I'm glad to hear that you
are well. ...says Master Broggen.

57126.「勇者の盟友 <pc>よ。\n わしは 叡智の冠のひとり 賢者ブロッゲン\n …:
<pc>, the Hero's ally. I am
Sage Broggen, one of the Crown of Wisdom.
...he says.

57127.「ブロッゲンさまは お眠りのことが多いので\n 愛用の杖であるところの ワガハイ:
Master Broggen is often asleep. So, I will
speak in his place, as I am his favorite
staff!

57129.「ふむふむ……。\n ブロッゲンさまは このように\n おっしゃって おらレール: Mhm, mhm... this is what Master Broggen said!

57130.「わしが あずかる秘技は 『勇者の眼』。\n 物事の真偽を見極めることで\n 魔:
The skill I can teach you is "Hero's Eye".
It helps reveal the truth by dispelling
illusions created by monsters.

57131.「この秘技なくして 大魔王や\n その眷属と戦うことは 難しいであろう。:
Without this skill, it will be quite
difficult to fight the Demon Lord and
his followers.

57132.「アンルシア姫が 『勇者の眼』を会得するには\n 真偽の試練を 果たしてもらわね:
In order for Princess Anlucia to acquire the
"Hero's Eye", she must undergo a Trial of
Truths to train her eyes to see what's real.

57133.「<pc>よ。勇者の盟友として お前には\n アンルシア姫とともに わしの用意し:
<pc>, as the Hero's ally, you
will fight alongside with Princess Anlucia
against the monster I have prepared for you.

57134.「……ということなんだけど\n <pc>も アンルシア姫と\n 一緒に この試練:
What I mean is...
Will you go with her to the trial?

57135.「<pc>。破邪の秘技の試練に\n 私と 一緒に行く準備が できたみたいね。:
Are you ready to go to the trial,
<pc>?

57136.「ブロッゲンさま。<pc>とともに\n 必ず 試練を果たしてまいります。:
Don't worry. Together with <pc>,
I will surely pass this trial.

57138.「真のアラハギーロのモンスター格闘場に向かえ。\n 試練の魔物と戦えるよう 従業:
Go to the true Al-Ahagiro's Monster Arena. I
spoke to Nadaf in advance, so that's where
you be able to undertake the trial.

57139.「アンルシア姫に <pc>。\n 気合入れて がんばるのでアールっ！！: Keep your spirits up and do your best!

57140.「<pc>は ひと足先に向かって。\n 私は ルシェンダさまに\n このことを伝:
<pc>, you can go on ahead.
I'll let Lushenda know about this, then
I'll be on my way.

57141.「んん？ <pc>は\n 他の人からの 頼まれごとで\n いっぱいみたいでアール:
Hmm? It seems that you're already busy with
other people's requests!

57142.「試練を受けるのは やめといたほうがいいね。\n とっとと 他の頼まれごとを片付:
It's not wise to undergo the trial now. Finish
up your other business, and then come back!

57143.「えっ 行ってくれないの？ しょうがないなあ。\n 行く気になったら また呼ぶの:
What's that? You're not going? That's a shame.
Whenever you're ready, come and talk to me!

57144.「ん？ どうしたのかな <pc>。\n 試練の内容を 忘れたでアールか？:
Hmm? What is it, <pc>?
Did you forget the details about the trial?

57146.「ブロッゲンさまは このように\n おっしゃって おらレール！: This is what Master Broggen said!

57147.「魔物の生みだす まやかしを見破る技……。\n 『勇者の眼』を 勇者姫が会得する:
In order for Princess Anlucia to acquire the "Hero's Eye", she must undergo a Trial of Truths to train her eyes to see through
illusions created by monsters.

57148.「勇者の盟友として お前には\n 勇者姫とともに わしの用意した魔物と\n 戦っ:
As the Hero's ally, you will fight alongside
Anlucia against the monster I have prepared
for you.

57149.「真のアラハギーロのモンスター格闘場に向かえ。\n 試練の魔物と戦えるよう 従業:
Go to the true Al-Ahagiro's Monster Arena. I
spoke to Nadaf in advance, so that's where
you be able to undertake the trial.

57150.「わかったら とっとと\n 試練を 果たしにいくのでアール！！:
If you understand, then please go to trial
right away!!

57151.「<cs_pchero> お待たせ。\n どうやら あれが 試練の魔物のようね。:
Sorry to keep you, <pc>.
I suppose that's the monster we must
defeat for the trial.

57154.「ブロッゲンさまから 聞いたわ。\n 『勇者の眼』は 魔物の生みだした\n まや:
Broggen said that the Hero's Eye is a
technique for seeing through the illusions
created by monsters.

57155.「その技がなければ おそらく\n この魔物を倒すことは できないはずよ。:
Without it, we probably won't be able to
defeat them...

57156.「<cs_pchero>……よく聞いて。\n 私が 『勇者の眼』を会得するには\:
Listen carefully... if I'm to master the
Hero's Eye, then there's something I need
to learn from this battle.

57157.「だから あなたには\n この魔物の相手を 頼みたいの。: So, I'll need your help beating it.

57160.「今度こそ あなたのまやかしを見抜いて\n 『勇者の眼』の手がかりを つかんでみ:
This time, I will see through your illusion
to understand the Hero's Eye!

57163.「<cs_pchero> あなたには\n この魔物の相手を 頼みたいの。:
<cs_pchero>, I need you to deal with this
monster.

57166.「……見えたわ <cs_pchero>。\n あの魔物の本体と まやかしの違いが:
I see it! The difference between
the real one and the illusions!

67688.「<cs_pchero>！\n 私が 『勇者の眼』を使って\n まやかしの魔物を:
<cs_pchero>! I will use the
Hero's Eye to dispel the illusions!

67689.「あなたは 残った魔物の本体を攻撃して！\n チカラを合わせて がんばりましょう:
While I do that, you attack the real one!
Let's finish this, together!

67690.「……さあ いくわよ。\n あなたなんかに 負けないわ！: Come on! I won't lose to you!

67692.「……はあ はあ。\n やったわ……。ありがとう <cs_pchero>。\n:
*Huff, huff*... we did it. I couldn't have
done it without your help!

67693.「これは……。\n 身体の中に チカラが わいてくる……。:
It feels like... a surge of power flowing
through my body...

67694.どこからともなく 声が聞こえる……。: A voice was heard from out of nowhere...

67695.<center><cs_pchero>～ アンルシア姫～。\n聞こえるでアールか:
<cs_pchero>! Princess Anlucia! Can you
hear me?

67696.<center>ブロッゲンさまのお言葉があるので\n聞いてほしいのでアール～。: Sage Broggen has a few words to say to you.

67697.<center>勇者姫アンルシア。そして <cs_pchero>よ。\n試練の魔:
It seems that you have both done well
defeating the monster. You have successfully
passed the trial.

67698.<center>勇者姫に 真偽を見極めるチカラが宿り\n『勇者の眼』を会得したこ:
As one of the Crown of Wisdom, I declare
that Anlucia has now acquired the power to
see through illusions with the "Hero's Eye"!

67699.「ありがとうございます ブロッゲンさま。\n でも 私ひとりでは 無理でした。\:
Thank you, Sage Broggen. It's all thanks to
<cs_pchero> here that I was able to
succeed.

67700.<center>……その通りだ。破邪の秘技は\n勇者と盟友のふたりが そろってこ:
Correct. Remember, a Sacred Skill's true power
will reveal itself when the Hero and their
ally are as one.

67702.勇者姫アンルシアは 破邪の秘技のひとつ\n『勇者の眼』を 会得した！<me 71:
Anlucia has learned the "Hero's Eye",
one of the Sacred Skills!<me 71>

67703.<center>とにかく おつかれさま～。\nふたりとも 秘密会議室へ\nいった:
You've done well today. If you could, please
return to the meeting room at once!

67704.「グランゼドーラ城に 戻りましょう。\n <cs_pchero>も 忘れずに\n:
Let's go back to the castle. Don't forget to
go to the meeting room.

67705.「来たね <pc>に アンルシア姫。\n ブロッゲンさまより お言葉をいただいて:
You have both returned!
Master Broggen would like a word with you,
so please listen carefully!

67706.「……ご苦労であったな ふたりとも。\n アンルシア姫は 破邪の秘技のひとつを会:
Thank you both for your hard work. Princess
Anlucia has mastered one of the Sacred
Skills and has grown more powerful as a Hero.

67707.「その秘技を 盟友 <pc>とともに\n 今後の戦いに 役立ててくれることを願う:
I hope that you and your ally will use
this power in your battles to come...

67708.「そして <pc>よ。\n お前の働きは 勇者の盟友に\n まことに ふさわしい:
And <pc>... Your efforts show that
you are a worthy ally of the Hero.

67709.「あらかじめ そこにいるミルトに\n 報酬を渡してあるので 受け取るがよい。\n:
I've given a reward to Milt there in
advance, so please, take it!

67711.「調子は どうだ <pc>？\n 少しばかり 心配でな。様子を見にきた。:
How are things? I was a little worried, so I
came to check up on you.

67712.「あっ ルシェンダさま。\n 私 『勇者の眼』を会得しま……:
Oh, Lushenda! I was able to master the
Hero's Eye!

67713.「どうした アンルシア？\n 私のカオに 何か ついているか？: What is it? Is there something on my face?

67715.「……なるほどな。物事の真偽を見極める\n 『勇者の眼』を 確かに会得したらしい:
I see... You're able to see through illusions,
meaning you've truly mastered the Hero's Eye.

67716.「ふふっ。これからも その調子で頼むぞ。\n アンルシア……それに <pc>。: Hehe. Keep up the great work, both of you.

67717.「……<pc>よ。\n この世には 見えぬほうがよい真実もある。\n 今のは そ:
<pc>... there are some truths
in this world that are better left unseen.
That is one of them. Pay it no mind.

67718.「……というわけで <pc>も\n おつかれさまだったのでアール！: Anyways! Please have a well deserved rest!

67719.「アンルシア <pc>。\n 破邪の秘技の会得 大儀であった。:
Mastering the Sacred Skills is quite a great
honor.

67720.「さっそく 叡智の冠の賢者たちを召集し\n このことを 報告したいと思う。:
I will immediately summon the Crown of
Wisdom to report the great news.

67721.「……叡智の冠の諸君。ご苦労である。\n 皆が与えた試練を果たし 勇者姫アンルシ:
Sages of the Crown of Wisdom. You will be
pleased to know that Anlucia has passed
all the trials you have given her.

67722.「さらに 勇者の盟友たる <pc>の\n 大きな成長も 見逃せない。\n 今こそ:
We also cannot ignore the growth of the
Hero's ally. The time has come to do
battle with the Demon Lord!

67723.「……浮かれるのは 早いぞ。\n 破邪の秘技とて ひとつの技に過ぎぬ。\n 活か:
...We cannot declare victory just yet. The
Sacred Skills are just that, skills. It's up
to their user how they are utilized.

67724.「ブロッゲンさまも 言っておらレール！\n 破邪の秘技は 相手によって\n 使い:
It's just as Master Broggen said! It's
important to use the Sacred Skills depending
on the situation!

67725.「でも アンルシア姫なら 大丈夫。\n 盟友として とても 頼りになる\n <p:
However, Princess Anlucia will be fine. She
is accompanied by her very dependable ally!

67726.「そうじゃぞ アンルシアちゃん。\n 勇者だからと なんでもかんでも\n ひとり:
That's right, Anlucia. A Hero can't do
everythin' alone.

67727.「うむ。神代のチカラを授かった勇者とて\n ひとりでは できることに 限界があろ:
Right. Even a Hero with divine power has
limits of what they can do alone. Your ally
and companions are your support.

67728.「勇者が 彼らに 勇気を分け与えることで\n 大いなるチカラの流れが 生まれるの:
When a Hero shares their courage with their
companions, a great surge of power is created.
That power can defeat the Demon Lord.

67729.「勇者姫アンルシア。そして <pc>よ。\n 残る聖地の 神の緋石を守るにあたり:
I hope you both will make full use of the
Sacred Skills in protecting the Divine
Crimsonites.

67730.「神の緋石を守り抜くことは 世界の運命を変え\n 運命の振り子に チカラを与える:
Protecting the Divine Crimsonites will
change the fate of the world and give power
to the Pendulum of Fate. Don't forget that.

67732.「いっそう 勇者らしいカオになったな。\n そなたと <pc>ならば\n この世:
You've become quite the Hero. I truly believe
that both of you together can save this
world.

67733.「……叡智の冠の賢者諸君。\n 我々の役割が ひとつ終わったな。\n それでは:
Sages of the Crown of Wisdom. We have done our
part. Let us await for the time where we must
gather once more.

78278.「私は 意識を集中して まやかしの魔物を\n 見抜けるか 試してみるわ。\n そ:
I'll focus myself to see if I can spot the
illusions. If I can do that, then I'm certain
the Hero's Eye will, too...

78849.「私は 意識を集中して まやかしの魔物を\n 見抜けるか 試してみるわ。\n そ:
I'll focus myself to see if I can spot the
illusions. If I can do that, then I'm certain
the Hero's Eye will, too...

80311.「はい ルシェンダさま。\n <pc>と チカラを合わせ\n 私は 戦い続けます:
Understood. I will continue to fight alongside
<pc>.

80312.「……<pc>。今後も\n アンルシアのチカラに なってくれ。\n しかと 頼ん:
Please continue to lend Anlucia your strength,
<pc>. I have faith in you.

80313.「私が 破邪の秘技を会得できたのは\n あなたが いてくれたから。\n これから:
It's thanks to you that I was able to master
all of the Sacred Skills. Let's keep doing
our best, <pc>!

92722.アンルシアと <pc>は\nすべての破邪の秘技を 会得したことを\n賢者ルシェン:
Anlucia and <pc> informed
Sage Lushenda that they had learned all of
the Sacred Skills.
